name: SparseMatrixStructure
desc: A structure that represents the sparsity structure of a sparse matrix.

items.name: init(rowCount: Int32, columnCount: Int32, columnStarts: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>, rowIndices: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>, attributes: SparseAttributes_t, blockSize: UInt8)
items.desc: Creates a new structure that represents the sparsity structure of a sparse matrix.

items.name: var attributes: SparseAttributes_t
items.desc: The attributes of the matrix, such as whether itâ€™s symmetrical or triangular.

items.name: var blockSize: UInt8
items.desc: The block size of the matrix.

items.name: var columnCount: Int32
items.desc: The number of columns in the matrix.

items.name: var columnStarts: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>
items.desc: The starting index for each column in the row indices array.

items.name: var rowCount: Int32
items.desc: The number of rows in the matrix.

items.name: var rowIndices: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int32>
items.desc: The row indices of the matrix.
